Name: 扶搖直上
About the game: You will play the role of a faction of leaders, in the rivers and lakes and the hall of the flood, how to lead the school to become strong? You're going to have a lot of choices, and you're going to have a simple 'yes' or 'no' decision, Can affect your school reputation, wealth, martial arts and disciples. Every decision you make, Both may lead to prosperity, but may also lead to disaster. Too little wealth; The disciples did not have enough to eat and fell into weeds. Too much wealth; May also lead to the evil bandit's covetousness so that the clan was plundered. If the sect's reputation is too low, it will be expelled from wulin. Too high reputation will be sent to the court to 'peace.' As the saying goes, 'the only way to have a husband is not to fight.' It's going to be one of your biggest projects as a manager. The game adopts the national style of ink and wash painting, freehand art performance, and the question bank and puzzle of taking money from the 'I ching', In this happy enmity of the rivers and lakes, you will reflect a kind of ancient plain and sincere swordsman atmosphere.
